code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import DeleteTodo from'./DeleteTodo';import'./TodoList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TodoList=()=>{const[todos,setTodos]=useState([]);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchTodos=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:10000/api/todos',{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem('token')}`}});const data=await response.json();setTodos(data);}catch(error){console.error('Failed to fetch todos:',error);}};fetchTodos();},[]);const handleGoToDashboard=()=>{navigate('/dashboard');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"My To-Do List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"todo-list",children:todos.map(todo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"todo-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"todo-title",children:[todo.title," ",todo.completed?'(Completed)':'']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"todo-actions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"edit-todo-link",to:`/update-todo/${todo._id}`,children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteTodo,{id:todo._id})]})]},todo._id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"add-todo-link",to:"/add-todo",children:"Add New items"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"dashboard-button",onClick:handleGoToDashboard,children:"Go to Dashboard"})]});};export default TodoList;
